meanings.definition: The act of formulating a new theory or set of theories.
meanings.sent1: After much thought, the retheorization of the scientific model was complete.
meanings.sent2: The retheorization of the economic principles led to a breakthrough in understanding.
meanings.sent3: The retheorization of the history textbook made it more interesting to read.
meanings.sent4: Her retheorization of the mystery novel plot added a new layer of complexity.
meanings.sent5: Through the retheorization, the concept became clearer and more precise.

meanings.definition: The process of reevaluating and restructuring existing theories.
meanings.sent1: The retheorization of the educational system brought about positive changes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists engage in retheorization to enhance the accuracy of their findings.
meanings.sent3: The retheorization of the recipe made it taste even better than before.
meanings.sent4: The retheorization of the business strategy resulted in increased efficiency.
meanings.sent5: Through careful retheorization, the flaws in the theory were corrected.

meanings.definition: To rethink or reconsider the theoretical framework of a concept or idea.
meanings.sent1: She decided to retheorize the concept to gain a fresh perspective.
meanings.sent2: The team will retheorize their approach to problem-solving for better results.
meanings.sent3: He retheorized the design of the building to make it more sustainable.
meanings.sent4: The artist retheorized her painting technique to achieve a new style.
meanings.sent5: By retheorizing the hypothesis, they uncovered a crucial flaw.
